Uses of Class
model.Edge

  • Packages that use Edge 
    Package Description
    model  
    view  

    • Uses of Edge in model

      Methods in model that return Edge 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Edge Graph.closeDoorRandom()
      Close randomly a door from the graph.
      Edge Door.getDoor()
      Getter on the Edge corresponding to the door location.
      Edge Graph.getEdgeByDir(Vertex source, Model.Directions dir)
      Return an Edge connecting the source Vertex to a Vertex in the Directions dir.
      Methods in model with parameters of type Edge 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Vertex Graph.setSwitchOff(Edge door)
      Retrieves the Vertex to place the switch to close the Edge door.
      Vertex Graph.setSwitchOn(Edge door)
      Retrieves the Vertex to place the switch to open the Edge door.
      Constructors in model with parameters of type Edge 
      Constructor and Description
      Door(Vertex switchOn, Vertex switchOff, Edge door)
      Create a door and the switches linked to it.

    • Uses of Edge in view

      Methods in view with parameters of type Edge 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void View.updateDoor(Edge door, Edge.Type status)
      Update the color of a door according to its type (closed or opened).
